name: Upin Ipin Demi Metromillenium
description:
Join Upin & Ipin as they defend Metromillenium city from the clutches of the evil Doctor Sally and his Egg robots!

Enter the futuristic world of Metromillenium city with lots of challenges! Guide Sergeants Upin & Ipin through Metromillenium city and get ready for the ultimate adventure:

* Run and collect Upin & Ipin power coins to call upon the powerful Metrobot to defeat Doctor Sally
* Run, dash, jump, slide, dodge obstacles like a pro and save all of Upin & Ipin friends along the way
* Wear various costumes from Upin & Ipin TV Series with special effect!
* Finish various missions through the gameplay and get cool rewards!
* Run as far as you can to get the highest score and share it with your friends!
* Upgrade your power ups to help Upin & Ipin run further on their quest!
* Take selfies with Upin & Ipin and show it to your friends!

Let's run with Upin & Ipin and protect Metromillenium city!

Visit our links for more information.

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/kelabupindanipin
Website/Blog: http://upinandipin.com.my/
Twitter: twitter.com/lescopaque
